article.headline: Back to normal? We can do better: Here are the best new ideas in money
article.body: MARKETWATCH FRONT PAGE MarketWatch’s third annual Best New Ideas in Money explores innovative thinking with the potential to change how we live, work, spend, save and invest See full story.My husband of 20 years is having an affair. He told friends he wants a divorce and does NOT want to pay alimony. What should I do? ‘There is a huge pay gap between us, as my husband has more education and an uninterrupted work history as he has continued to climb the corporate ladder.’ See full story. When is the Mike Pence–Kamala Harris debate? Next up on the debate stage: Mike Pence and Kamala Harris. Donald Trump’s vice president and Joe Biden’s running mate will face off against each other in Salt Lake City on Oct. 7, in the sole vice-presidential debate of Campaign 2020. See full story.Trump tweets, ‘Don’t be afraid of Covid,’ sparking heated Twitter exchanges The coronavirus has killed roughly 210,000 Americans, and millions more with the virus don’t have the health-care benefits Trump does. See full story.Why Wall Street is doing great while Main Street is still closed The economic crisis has disproportionately affected small businesses and low-income service workers, which is one main reason why stock-market valuations are high while the real economy remains so fragile. See full story.MARKETWATCH PERSONAL FINANCE President Trump left Walter Reed Monday and returned to the White House, telling the nation, ‘Don’t be afraid of it.’ Anthony Fauci later cautioned the president’s condition ‘could have a reversal.’ See full story.
